channel.title: Projects on Anders Bergh
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Anders Bergh

item.title: Go modules
item.description: gronox Not yet released, more info later. ics https://github.com/anders/ics A simple iCal encoder. jutf https://github.com/anders/jutf Converting to/from Java UTF-8 strings (DataInput/OutputStream). panosplit https://github.com/anders/panosplit One of my first Go programs, splits an image into square parts. Looks nice on Instagram. plessey https://github.com/anders/plessey UK Plessey barcode calculation. strutils https://github.com/anders/strutils String functions used by my other projects / libraries.
